name: Sacred Stone
description:
Traditional ceremony in Togo.
The sacred stone celebrated each year in Anéhô

By buying this nft you help our voluntary association ASO Togo - https://asotogo.b35.fr/

We work for the development of education and child protection, for the protection of the environment, and for development in Togo
Choosing ASO Togo means being in the service of Deprived and Orphaned Children
- Working for their well-being in the social rank such as, # Education, (helping them in schooling).
# Health (emergency and free care, especially hygiene awareness
- fighting against mistreatment, forced labor, and sexual abuse
